name: flowstate-ai
description: AI-first, self-improving CRM-OS for network marketers and solo founders

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend && npm run test:e2e
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:frontend && npm run lint:fix:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../python-worker && pip install -r requirements.txt
